website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, adjustable lamp ideal for placing in a corner to brighten up the whole room.
pros: We love how it has three adjustable arms to provide a lot of light to a large area
cons: A few users have complained about the difficulty of the assembly

customer_reviews.title: Proceed with caution!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool looking lamp. I got 2. The first one the base would not tighten and the pole would not fasten. So I returned it. What a hassle that was. Then the second one came. The base still will not tighten and I can't even confirm if I'm putting together correctly because the instructions are not clear at all. It's very wobbly and unsafe. Also the shades do not spread apart too much. Very little. Image has more space between but it's not like that on mine nor can I adjust too much. I am keeping it only because I don't want to deal with another return. Way better in the image. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: britney

customer_reviews.title: Get this lamp, you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: This Is a great lamp and great quality and price is awesome. Fits very well behind my sofa and compliments my living room. It was really well packed. (In 3 different boxes plus then some...) Easy to assemble. (Read the reviews when I bought it so I knew what I was going to deal with)
customer_reviews.author: Anne-Ly McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Don't order this lamp! very poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The metal thread on one of the lamp pieces prevented the lamp from screwing together and standing straight. Although the lamp that was delivered to me was defective, it's still a very poor quality item. Difficult to put together and poor design. There is some style to this piece and the marble is nice, the construction makes it cheap looking. Also, the shade is oatmeal, not white or off white. Now attempting to repack and return. Spare yourself this very time consuming, styrofoam everywhere mistake! Spend a little more and get a quality lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Hgal

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Adds nice visual interest to the room. I like the look with 60 W bulbs. The light options (1-3 on at a time) is great! It took me about half an hour to put it together. The way it's packaged would make it difficult to return.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Great Style and Value!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was a little tricky to put together but the end result is a well functioning, quality lamp that we really enjoy. I was pleasantly surprised by how heavy the base is, which is especially appreciated because my toddler has so far not been able to knock it over! The shade looks a little cheap to me but no one else seems to notice or care so it will likely stay for now. It gives off adequate light and the arc is the perfect petite size I was looking for. I am so glad I took a chance on this instead of paying twice as much for a Crate and Barrel or West Elm lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Harris

customer_reviews.title: Wanted so bad to love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this lamp and it was very easy for us to put together and it stands up just fine, however... it has now barely been a year and only one of the three lamps still works. I am so bummed and so disappointed. I paid a little over $100 and feel ripped off and I see it is now over $200 on Amazon...I would not pay that at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda D.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stand straight.
customer_reviews.text: A disaster. Called Amazon customer service & was given a link to the manufacturer’s customer service contact email - which turned out to be for a completely unrelated company! Adesso the lamp manufacturer’s email address would not work for me, so I called several numbers listed on their website and got voicemail for all. Left a message but not hopeful. Large and heavy & a pain to assemble so not looking forward to returning.
customer_reviews.author: lcclev67

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment...
customer_reviews.text: I received this and didn't put it together for some time as I was working every day. About 2 weeks ago I put it together and only one lamp works, my husband is an electrician and said he would fix it when he could however he was not able to and said that the quality of the wires and fixtures is the cheapest possible. I am so disappointed in this lamp and now I am outside of my return window. It is very pretty but definitely poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca bohbrink

customer_reviews.title: Sophisticated Floor Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is modern, sophisticated and good quality. The assembly was very easy, took about 10 minutes. The base is very, very heavy and solid so the lamp will not tip and the shades are movable so you can have light in different areas. Also you can have one, two or all three lamps on at the same time. This lamp quality and look exceeds anything that you would get at a target-like store.
customer_reviews.author: A.R.V.F., Miami, FL

customer_reviews.title: Very nice design. The three arms swing around 360 degrees ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design. The three arms swing around 360 degrees independently, making the whole lamp more adjustable than I had hoped. Base is heavy and solid. Shades are nice, black cord has some kind of cotton-like covering? Best of all: wattage is 300 total; each light is 100 watts. That's over 3,000 lumens with all three lamps on, depending on the bulbs you choose. And you can turn the switch to get one, two, or all three lights on. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Logic

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These lamps look really great and have a contemporary feel. The have a heavy substantial base and a knob that allows you to select between OFF and one to 3 lamps, but no dimmer. I use an external Lutron Caseta lamp dimmer (big fan of the Caseta line). The height of the 3 lamps is varied as shown, but not really adjustable. I highly recommend using decorator-style LED bulbs with visible filaments, as the bulbs are clearly visible when seated below the shades, and they provide a nice warm illumination.
customer_reviews.author: W. SteblerTop Contributor: Amazon Echo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking lamp!!
customer_reviews.text: Put together just fine out of the box, those people who complain about the thread messing up are impatient because they didn't take their time aligning the poles before they start screwing them together piece by piece. It doesn't take much muscle to force a bad threading before ruining the poles. Looks magnificent and amazing in the living room behind a long couch.
customer_reviews.author: EnglandAPO

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamp, assembling was super easy piece on cake, lamp doesn't come with bulbs but it doesn't matter I used 5000k light bulbs on it and looks perfect, build quality is very good the base is heavy made of concrete covered with metal, help a lot with stability, the tube is very sturdy and things hanging are well made, it does have 3 modea, was a little confuse first but it was very easy to figure out, still it is on the instructions. I plugged the lamp to a smart socked which it now makes it a smart lamp, nothing better than controlling your lights with your voice.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo F.

customer_reviews.title: If there were a 0 star rating, I'd use it.
customer_reviews.text: The lamp base is unstable. It's starts to tip after you add the shades to it. This is the second lamp we bought. The first one wouldn't assemble correctly. Though that wasn't the issue this time. If this lamp was 40 bucks I wouldn't complain but for the price, it doesn't makes sense that the quality would be so terrible. Do yourself a favor and don't get this lamp. Sincerely, Dissatisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Caristeenah

customer_reviews.title: After assembling and posing a beautiful lamp, mine did not work
customer_reviews.text: If you buy this, first thing before you assemble it, put the bulbs in and see if it works. After assembling and posing a beautiful lamp, mine did not work. And I got a million styrofoam bits all over the place and had to vaccum 3 times. And it was damaged (all 3 shades and base). If it had worked, I would have kept it and asked for replacement shades. Too bad it did not work out - I am returning it and buying something else.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Nice to create atmosphere
customer_reviews.text: I like this lamp because it works well on our dining/study table. It's kind of hard to assemble, but once you manage to do that, it works well and seems pretty stable (wouldn't let your 4 yr toddler to test it though). The only annoying thing is that I expected the branches to move and turn, instead they are fixed in a certain position, adn they are pretty close to each other, and a bit short. Nonetheless, I am happy with my purchase, even if I believe it's a bit too pricey (I paid 100 because took the one with yellowish hats)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caution- black not bronze
customer_reviews.text: There must be a few versions of this out there based on the reviews. It arrived in one box, not multiples as some reviewers wrote. It is also solid black, nothing bronze about it. The cord is also black, not clear as in the description. The instructions were also for another model and described removing parts that were not there. It was awkward to assemble without instructions but not difficult. It’s functional but the color is a bummer. If I wanted a black lamp I would have bought one. It makes it look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Nick M.

customer_reviews.title: Costco is Selling the same bronze lamp for $79.99
customer_reviews.text: And now I wish I could return it and get $60 back! The bottom is cement with no covering. Had to put a piece of cardboard under to protect my wood floors. In general the second lamp we purchased (had to return the first since one of the lights didn't work) seems to work well and adds a lot of light to the room with the three bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. Love that you don't have to always turn on all three lights. Different options to fit the mood. Packaging was super and protected all pieces. Not one scratch. I chose to use 25watt bulbs this way when using one light it's a warm soft feel but still good for reading. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love the lamp and it was easy to assemble. Looks modern and classy. Not sure how the "adjustable and flexible heads" works, the arms are rigid and I don't want to bend the metal. Upon delivery the base cover had a dent in it. When i contacted the manufacturer by email (which was provided along with a card specifically for requesting replacement parts), they immediately responded that the replacement part was not available and that I would have to return the entire lamp to Amazon. Not loving the Adesso customer service...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon55750

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Base was concrete but seemed to be crumbling. Metal sheath was barely attached as a cover but was thin, flimsy, and scratched. I felt like there was no way the metal cover would stay attached and it was so thin it would be bent or damaged within days. Shades seemed okay. I didn't even bother trying to put it together. One look at the base and it all went back in the box to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: jc3385865

customer_reviews.title: Good looking lamp with a pretty base.
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a fancy light to extend over a new sectional. I bought this (which comes with a nice silvery shade) - I made a custom shade for it. I'm kind of surprised the small base is strong enough; but the lamp seems sturdy enough. We've been using it about 2 months now. I have it on a smart outlet, leaving the lamp "on"; so I can have Alexa turn it on and off. Working like a champ, and my wife's happy with the stainless steel look which matches some other accessories in the house. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mendelowitz

customer_reviews.title: Quite good for the price...but slightly wobbly.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was easy to assemble- it took ~30 minutes, and the finished product looked exactly as described. The vendor also shipped very quickly and the item was very well packaged. Overall, the result is attractive. One small complaint is that it's pretty difficult to get the post perfectly vertical... it tends to lean one way or another, depending on how you orient the three arms, and no amount of tightening seems to fix that, because the design just isn't as robust as one might wish. You will want a socket or torque wrench; ordinary pliers or an adjustable wrench probably won't get the bottom nut as tight as you need for optimal stability.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bedroom for both a reading light and to get extra light in the closet. The box is pretty flimsy so arrived a bit torn up but the lamp was not damaged. It looks great. One thing to note is if you do not use dimmer bulbs the lowest light will not turn on until you click three times. The cord is on the short side. The shades are different sizes as they come packed nesting inside each other. I have 40 watt equivalent bulbs in the picture and mobile home ceilings so they are a foot lower than usual to give context to my picture. Overall very happy with my lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about this purchase. The lamp assembled with ease and I had no issue with product quality. My one minor complaint is the shade isn’t lined and when the lamp is on you can see the bulb through the shade somewhat. The LED bulb that was included is plenty bright. I have this in the corner of my home office and it really brightens up the room. I may look for another shade with a euro fitter eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Kris11364

customer_reviews.title: Quality control lacking. All important pieces damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting for this lamp. I wanted this lamp so bad that I was willing to keep it even with that big dent you can see in the pole. However after continuing with assembly I can't even attach the lamp to the base because that's broken too! I'm so bummed because here lately the quality control from Amazon has been lacking. And these are big items that take a lot of effort to repack in order to ship back... so I'll have to start buying these things from local places. Got my desk from IKEA and lamp from target.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshyne

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE PRODUCT - DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Just unboxed the newly delivered Adesso lamp and one of the light sockets is defective. Only 2 of 3 sockets work. I put a brand new incandescent bulb in all three sockets and unfortunately just like others have posted, this product is defective. It's obviously a manufacturer issue and Amazon needs to remove Adesso as a product vendor for ripping off customers with fraudulent, defective products. If I have problems getting this replaced I'll post an update. As of now I'm disgusted that Adesso is too lazy and incompetent to test their products before customers pay good money for them. Adesso is a poor manufacturer and this product is defective out of the box. DON'T PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick K OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Once you get this put together, you will be likely to love it. This lamp is big and tall. Like others have said, the Styrofoam packaging made a mess. The directions are not very clear, but I did figure it out and was able to put it together by myself. I did have a problem getting the piece with the "arms" into the rest of the lamp, but finally resorted to gentle force by using a rubber mallet to pound them together. Worked perfectly. I found that "daylight" LEDs looked funny with the warm color of the shades, so I switched them to "warm glow effect."
customer_reviews.author: Ricka Gerstmann

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to put together
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with this product. Was so excited to get it in the house, but when we attempted to put it together it was IMPOSSIBLE. The metal tubes making up the lamp’s base were not able to be screwed together due to glue residue junking up the inside of the lamp. We spent hours with sand paper attempt to wear the residue down, but were never able to do it enough to screw in the base. We ended up re-packing the item and are sending it back. Not happy with the overall experience.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklynn

customer_reviews.title: Chic & Functional
customer_reviews.text: I was looking high and low for the right lamp to put in the little office/den area in my duplex. This lamp totally fits the bill. The 3 light bulbs light up the entire room (there are 3 settings so you can adjust how much light you want). The height is just right. I wanted something taller than the standard 50 inches because of the high ceilings but it couldn't be too tall because it sits above a bean bag chair. The only thing I wish was different are the cords that attach to each lamp. In the picture they appear to be white or clear but they are black on my lamp. That said, it doesn't look bad.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea G.

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy base. Putting it together takes a minute ...
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy base. Putting it together takes a minute but very well made. Definitely tall enough to put over a couch
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL LAMP FOR A DARK CORNER
customer_reviews.text: We love, love, love this lamp. It's very stylish and lights up a corner that needed it. It turns on 1, 2, or 3 lights at a time, which is a nice feature; however, I always turn them all on anyway. Check the height before you purchase. For some reason, it appears taller in the picture than it is, but I had verified the height ahead of time and it's perfect for our living room. There is a little assembly to it, so keep a good sense of humor when you're putting it together. You'll know what I mean when you get it.
customer_reviews.author: CAShopR

customer_reviews.title: All I can say is the lab is absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is absolutely beautiful yet still contemporary. What I like about this lamp is it has a warm contemporary look to it . My only suggestion would be, be sure to use warm light bulbs. I tried one of each cool and warm. The cool Bulb for some reason did not blend with the lamp. It almost it didn't look right. However the warm bulb blended perfectly. This would be a welcomed addition to any modern contemporary designed home. It would add warmth but still remain contemporary which would not conflict to your decoration. Actually come to think of it it would be a nice addition to any home.
customer_reviews.author: Joyful

customer_reviews.title: quality control problems
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturers/importers of this lamp clearly have quality control problems. In several places on the main shaft it was clear that the black finish had been either improperly applied or scratched away - and the "fix" was to just take a black sharpie marker to the area (see photo). Assembly was also more problematic than it should have been, as the threads to match up the various pieces were poorly scored.
customer_reviews.author: C. B.

customer_reviews.title: Threading was stripped...Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I’m so upset that the threading was stripped in this lamp when I screwed it into the base, therefore it won’t stand up straight, but the item was way too large for me to ship back, so I’ve had to try and jam something into it to keep it upright, but it still falls back down. Don’t purchase this. It’d be 5 stars if it stood up straight.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Economical and lots of light!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly would have been worse had we not read the reviews! Plenty of light and fits our space nicely. Like the 1,2 or 3 light option. Diffusers would have been nice on the underside but hey for the money spent this cannot be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Thelma G Parsons

customer_reviews.title: ridiculously cheap design mis aligned fretts, cheap and junky, buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a client . I would not dare hand this junky cheap wobbly, crooked lamp to anyone... quick frankly I DOUBT I could give it away since it is kinked and limp.... I HAVE ARETAIL STORE FOR OVER 40 YEARS AND GOD KNOWS I have assembled hundreds of lamps and furniture pieces. but this is the worst I HAVE EVER SEEN. I NOW GET TO GO ORDER ANOTHER LAMP TO REPALCE THIS JUNKY MADE ITEM. NO HOPE FOR A REFUND HERE EITHER
customer_reviews.author: Michele Gardiner

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a much more expensive light
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a similar light at Home Depot. I painted the house and we wanted white shades and a silver base. So we purchased this light as it went much better with our new paint colors. It is significantly better quality than the light from Home Depot. I highly recommend this light. The light from Home Depot now is in our game room.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Newby

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lamp for about 2 years now. I hate it. From the get go we could never get it to fully support itself. The pieces didn't screw into itself securely. It wants to tip over. I've moved it two times (within the room). I've always had to have it leaning on a piece of furnature to support it. Today I got fed up and tried to take it apart to tighten all the screws again going it would support itself better. Only to find that now the middle joint is stripped. So yet another area in which it won't support itself. This lamp has been a nightmare from day one.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Oofph! Not at all the style promised
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back immediately. Not only were there scratch marks and 1 gouge on the pole, but the asthetics were disappointing. The shades were essentially made of burlap fabric. And the finish of "antique bronze" is rediculous. The metal is black. Maybe slightly brownish in certain light, but pretty much just black metal. Who does black metal with brown burlap? The style was all off. I'll keep my old Adesso lamp and pass on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B.

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp, weak instructions
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp. Solid base and post. Shades are nice. Pretty easy to assemble but be cautious reading instructions. Parts are not labeled and assembling the post to the base is a little confusing. Basically, you have to remove the thread, bolts, and a washer from the base to assemble. Not a dealbreaker so I don’t think it merits a lower score. Best price I have found for this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: justin h. starr

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe I didn’t purchase this lamp sooner! It was sitting in my cart for so long while I shopped around for other options. I didn’t end up finding anything else that worked aesthetically or price-wise so I purchased the lamp, hoping it would work out. We love it!! It makes our space so much brighter, it’s beautiful and sturdy, and it’s a perfect height over our sectional. I have it placed in the corner of the sectional and I was worried it’d be too low and hanging over someone’s head when they sat in the corner but it hasn’t been an issue at all. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs M

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful floor lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is beautiful and give plenty of light. It was easy to ensamble and it can be set to have one, two or three lights on to fit your needs. I am very happy with it! Time will tell how is the durability, it feels sturdy. I put some Edison style LED ligh bulbs on it and it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: esemprun

customer_reviews.title: Modern light with quality construction
customer_reviews.text: If you have been thinking about buying this light for a while like I was, don’t wait. Just buy it! This lamp is super heavy duty and has three different light levels depending on your needs. The base is solid concrete under the metal so it not going anywhere! It is definitely worth the price and I get complements on it regularly!
customer_reviews.author: esmom1123

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp, and it’s frustrations
customer_reviews.text: Minus two stars for poor instructions and missing a tool to finish it. Instructions were rough. All shoved onto one sheet, and things were not very clear. And for the knob that controls the light, the screw in there requires a smaller Allen wrench than the one provided, so I’m currently unable to to tighten it on.
customer_reviews.author: P Guy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Lamp is so annoying to assemble. In the photos it shows a white lamp shade and I received a light brown/dark beige lamp shade, which was hideous. The arched bars were completely bent and therefore it was not a straight arc. Marble base was not actually marble, it was just straight white. Completely disappointed and returning immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: It shows up easily. Please see photos attached and send me the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp and it had bold thread line on one of the front lamp also one of the string(pipe) has rust on it. Buying a lamp of this price, you wouldn't expect any damages on it. Specially this is lamp and has light on it, It shows up easily. Please see photos attached and send me the replacements for both the parts.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this lamp. It is beautiful...BUT my poles were scratched up. I assembled it carefully and as I was pulling off the protectant plastic I noticed a bunch of scratches on the metal. Pretty disappointing...it also leans and doesn’t tighten up all the way so for such a pretty piece it seems flimsy. I’ve tried tightening the pole into the base but i think it’s stripped
customer_reviews.author: WhitneyT89

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: I got the three arm Trinity in Antique Bronze and it really is a quality product, unlike other Arc type lamps. I have another lamp from Adesso, the Oslo floor lamp, and they are both top notch. I wish it was a little higher, as we have it placed in the two story living room, but it provides plenty of light with great ambiance and fits our interior well. The marble base isn't finished, so they covered it with a thin metal cover, which is my only gripe. A nice polished marble base would have been nice, but probably not for this price.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Strings attached ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for corner lighting in a living room. The fixture allows good lighting when reading. It has three different settings. One thing that is not attractive is the exposed wiring. It cheapens the appearance and looks unfinished. Look at the top of the rod, a wire leads to the shade mounting. The manufacturer should have come up with a better solution.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The light is a little cheaper looking than I hoped. The knob that controls the switch is loose, and the cords that the shades hang from are a bit frayed. I think separate switches for each light would have been a better design, so you could turn on the ones you want. As it is, one light comes on, then that light goes out and the other 2 come on, then all three.
customer_reviews.author: BB75

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp--assembly a pain!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp looks awesome! After trying a few configurations--in the tiniest apartment ever!--I think I got it just right. But man, this was a pain in the butt to put together by myself. The instructions are also terrible. You'd think after all the reviews that make this point that the company would at least make a clearer guide on assembly. Oh, well. Like others have written, once it's up, who cares?
customer_reviews.author: Td

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp looks great and so much less expensive than similar ones I've seen in furniture stores. It was easy to assemble. The base is very heavy so the lamp has good stability. As others have mentioned, I would use a lower watt bulb if you're going to turn on all three lights. Right now I have 60 watt bulbs in each and it's really too bright for me. Overall the lamp provides good light for almost of all my sectional. I have it positioned in the corner and the lights spread out a little.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Chic design and study
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit tricky to assemble everything together but I reckon it's to build sturdiness of the overall structure. The shade had some wrinkle on the inside but it's not really visible unless I sit right underneath the light.
customer_reviews.author: Shibaski

customer_reviews.title: Packaging awful. Assembly worse. It looks good though.
customer_reviews.text: The lamp itself looks good. However, the packaging is god awful. Insane amounts of styrofoam that sheds everywhere. The assembly process gives you a brief glimpse of what it feels like to be in hell. I spent forever trying to feed the wires through the metal tubes so they would be hidden. The lamp itself doesn't balance correctly. I had to jam cardboard under the base to keep the thing from tipping over. It works fine and looks good now that it's set-up, but getting to that point seriously made me want to send this thing back just to express my frustration with the poor packaging and design choices.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is exactly what I wanted! I searched and searched for a lamp for my classroom. I wanted to create a calming feel, and this lamp filled the bill perfectly! I was also worried about it tipping over, but when I unpacked it, all my fears went away. The base is filled with a concrete type material and this lamp is steady! The quality is off the hook! I highly recommend this lamp. OH and it is very easy to assembly.!
customer_reviews.author: Lolo in California

customer_reviews.title: it works beautifully. IMO It's easier to put together a brand ...
customer_reviews.text: OK so this is a little bigger than I thought, but put in the corner of the room, it works beautifully. IMO It's easier to put together a brand new crib than this light. That is my only issue with this light. And while you have the option for 1 light, 2 lights or all 3 lit at the same time, I do wish that I could choose which lights I want lit. However, isn't that big of an issue. It's beautiful, looks expensive, gives off great light, and I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: KJ Chardonnay

customer_reviews.title: Product Good / Amazon & USPS Fail
customer_reviews.text: Well the light is as described. This review asks for brightness, I guess that depends on the bulb selected to install LOL. It was shipped Via Amazon all the way to Sacramento and then transferred to USPS in Sacramento for delivery. USPS said it would not fit in my mailbox and left a notice. I went online and scheduled a delivery and waited an additional 5 days after the scheduled delivery Date with no communication from USPS to call and finally had to go pick it up from USPS. Way to go PRIME! Product itself is awesome, service and procedure for delivery sucked!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The lamp was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Big fan. The lamp was easy to put together. The lampshades are hung by a rope-like electric cord, which I couldn't tell from the photos.
customer_reviews.author: lauren mccormick

customer_reviews.title: Functional, stylish, high quality
customer_reviews.text: This turned out even better than I'd hoped! Brought focused light to 3 separate areas and lovely style over our previous up-light. Took us a bit to get used to (it kind of startled us at first--it has quite a "presence"), but we can't imagine NOT having it now. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie H.

customer_reviews.title: Wrapped in excessive plastic
customer_reviews.text: Overall assembly was fine, a little confusing, but likely a problem on my end. What did make me upset is the ridiculous amount of plastic and wasteful materials used in packing. It's like the owners aren't informed that plastic subsidizes the oil industries that wreck our planet. That or they know and don't even care.
customer_reviews.author: squallpendragon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this lamp....
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the lamp, honestly, was very skeptical after reading the reviews.....however, I opened the box away from my set-up area...to avoid all of the Styrofoam issues--- it was packed great & I had no issues with any parts being broken-I read the directions once, put it together in app. 20 minutes. ONCE I put my living room back together, I was thrilled with the look of the lamp, the functionality, the cost & turning it on & off will be quite easy--- just by reaching over the couch to do it!!! I did use LED BULBS 40 watt, so there is no huge glare!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryandty2

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamp and easy to assemble. I love that it's basically three different lamps in one. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: A. Salgado

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking lamp
customer_reviews.text: Take the negative reviews with a grain of salt. This actually wasn't terrible to assemble; maybe 20 mins. The lamp looks very nice and just as good as the ones shown for much more. I'm satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dbfoto

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, but this lamp is beautiful, and I love it. The base is heavy and does a really nice job of stableizing the three arms. I was able to have it unboxed and assembled in less than 20 minutes. Great piece and addition to my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp. I saw the same lamp selling for $300 at our local furniture store, and it would still be worth even that price. It looks ultra modern and sleek and is easy to put together. Despite its appearance, the lamp is very stable and has not tipped over, even when bumped. The base is very heavy. I use ultra white LED lights in it and it makes the shades look bright white. You can use warmer yellower lights in it if you want a more "homey" look.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey L

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy until after barely any use the switch fell off ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy until after barely any use the switch fell off with no way to reattach. It appears to be missing the set screw to keep it attached. Now I just have the plastic piece sticking out to turn on and off which looks bad and hurts your fingers. I am going to see if the seller will send a replacement knob and if it works, I’ll update my review. Like I said, it looks great and worked fine until this fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kuechenmeister

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! It was easy to put together! The base is heavy and provides balance! Arrived packaged well and quickly! Love that you can use all the lamps or just one or two! You can also maneuver the directions (pattern) you want the lamps to lay! I highly recommend! They add light in the room and do away with the darkest of corners!
customer_reviews.author: chelle002

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfectly - Very Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: the styrofoam is a bit skittish, but as long as you dont tear everything apart like an animal it shouldnt really make a mess. other than that youre good to go - everything put together easily, lights work great against the wall behind my sectional without having to push the couch away from the wall too much at all. Lamps are adjustable, so you can spread them out or put them closer together - which ever way you like.
customer_reviews.author: Gunslinger

customer_reviews.title: Stood up for 1 day and looked amazing, then bam
customer_reviews.text: Lamp did not support itself. Stood up for 1 day and looked amazing, then bam! Fell. . . . Useless. The post comes off the base. We returned. Don't waste your time or money!
customer_reviews.author: Radell Havey

customer_reviews.title: I should of read the other reviews..it didn't work
customer_reviews.text: After 20 mins assembling I opened a fresh pack of bulbs and the third light did not come on. I swapped the light, no ,luck. The bulb did not resolve the issue. I knew I needed to return it. The next day prior to processing the return the 2nd arm didn't work. I again swapped out the bulbs. Only one of 3 lit.
customer_reviews.author: Scott or Karen  Russell

customer_reviews.title: Love this triple lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, and makes a statement. It can be turned on to use one, two, or all three lights. I am thrilled with it and have had it over a year now with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: MsTea

customer_reviews.title: We are very satisfied with the amount of lighting this unit furnishes
customer_reviews.text: Bought new furniture and the room does not have proper lighting so needed to get a floor lamp with the capability to light things up. We are very satisfied with the amount of lighting this unit furnishes. Its very attractive and quite easy to assemble. Very pleased with this order !
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: You have to climb inside.
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is huge and attractive! The only issue will be placement. Since it branches out you have to duck under the lamp to reach the control switch. I'd definitey plug this into a switch controlled outlet if able. However, it totally transforms the space and performs perfectly well!
customer_reviews.author: mactheoptimist

customer_reviews.title: The lamp is very pretty and bright and the price is good
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is very pretty and bright and the price is good. The packaging it came in was odd because the contents were in a box within a box within a box. There were at least three boxes to open. With lots of loose styrofoam balls. The base had a dent in it and the inside of the metal rods were rusted, like the product has been sitting in a warehouse for years. Regardless, it is a pretty lamp and it is sturdy. For the price, I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Oll

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good design
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and sturdy. I like the design. I do wish you could choose which light to have on individually but that no big bother. The switching goes from one on, middle, two on, outsides, or all three. Makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: PanHephaestus

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I put this together in about 30 minutes. It is a little hard for one person, better if you have someone to help hold the pieces. The light is really nice and very sturdy, the shades are really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Beth CochranTop Contributor: Fashion Design

customer_reviews.title: Nice-looking lamp; some fit & finish and assembly issues
customer_reviews.text: I found this lamp moderately difficult to build and certain elements of the fit and finish just seem a bit "off" (cord comes out of the front-left quadrant of the light pole instead of the back; instructions are printed in low resolution and seem to be missing a step here and there, making Ikea instructions a breeze in comparison). That being said, with my wife's help we were able to get the lamp assembled. Now that it is, it is indeed an attractive addition to our living room. We outfitted it with a three-pack of 5W (300-lumen) warm-white LED bulbs that I also found on Amazon, and it's become a great, power-sipping light source.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Brideau III

customer_reviews.title: Received defective parts - could not put lamp together
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware - as other customers mentioned, we received a faulty part. It was impossible to screw one pole into another because the threads were covered in some kind of gunk. The pieces also don't seem to be very high quality. It seems like some customers didn't get defective parts, but I wish I had read the reviews of those who did before buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the floor lamp I want
customer_reviews.text: High quality metal and good brass finish. Marble base is very steady and beautiful. It’s a little bit challenging to align the arc arm. Price beats a lot of other lamps on the market.
customer_reviews.author: SignalCat

customer_reviews.title: Lots of light, semi-easy construction
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp! We’ve been looking for something to add some pizazz and brightness to our dark living room. Paired this lamp with some White Ambiance Phillips Hue lights and it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Juh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful - but arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is really pretty once assembled. But the base arrived broken, as well as the pieces on the lamp shades. It was such a pain getting everything out of the box, and it was quite heavy, so we honestly decided to not bother with a return. It was going to sit behind our couch, and it was still functional, so we went with it. It's very bright, looks great. Better packaging might help this problem of the broken pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: Fits great in my living room! Looks nice, have had numerous comments/compliments on it. Only negative was it was a little awkward to put together by myself. Overall very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna V

customer_reviews.title: Great value love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp so much. Only difficulty was putting it together but once we got it - it is great!!! Had found a similar one in a local furniture store but this is a much better quality at a cheaper price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Kiser-Willey

customer_reviews.title: Base of lamp
customer_reviews.text: Update: 2/13/20, the middle light bulb will not light up. I’ve changed the bulb multiple times. Disappointed... I like the overall look of the lamp but I'm disappointed that the base it not solid color. You can see about an inch of the concrete . Against my dark brown wood floor it's very noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Renee G.

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp. I closely inspected the fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp. I closely inspected the fit and finish. Everything was fine, no noticeable scuffs, dents, or ripped fabric. When attaching the stem together, the power cables were a bit stuffed in there, so we carefully tucked the slack out of the way. We appreciate the extra allen screws, because they are easy to drop and lose when installing. The Amazon photo made the shades look a little dark, so I was worried, but the shades look like a standard off white in person. After installing some CFL light bulbs, we have a lot of nice soft light.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.

customer_reviews.title: Love the lamp
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the lamp. My fakespot app said that the Amazon reviews were rigged. Bought it anyway. This is a review from a satisfied buyer. The lamp is modern, and it looks amazing in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre, but serviceable
customer_reviews.text: As other people have commented, unpacking this lamp makes a mess and assembly is not straight-forward. I was close to sending this back because the two components making up the upright of the lamp do not fit together flush leaving a 1mm silver gap in an otherwise bronze lamp. Irritating, but for where we have placed the lamp, not a big enough issue to warrant the expense and hassle of returning it. The lamp throws a nice light and looks good in our application.
customer_reviews.author: J Bob Shu

customer_reviews.title: Decent lamp, terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent lamp and was pretty simple to assemble. I bought this based on the photos and reviews on Amazon, and I'm happy with it. I subtracted a star for the manner in which it was packaged. The styrofoam was in a million pieces and got everywhere. This was the most annoying part of putting it together. I snagg d this jewel on Amazon warehouse deals for a decent deal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Let There be Light!
customer_reviews.text: It takes me forever to make a decision and I am so happy I finally bought this lamp. It fits perfectly into our room and provides multi-choice functions to light you may need for reading or just ambiance. The bottom is heavy and the three lamps can be moved and regrouped. We have received lots of compliments on this lamp. Reasonable price for a good quality lamp.
customer_reviews.author: So Much to Learn - So Little Time

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhhhh
customer_reviews.text: This thing is flimsy. Parts didn’t fit well together, I never could get it to line up straight and I couldn’t even get it disassembled to return bec of a defect. Maybe I received a dud. Who knows. Only reason I gave two stars is because it looks half decent after tampering with it for hours...
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: This light fixture is wonderful. Provides a good source of light behind a ...
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture is wonderful. Provides a good source of light behind a sofa the was placed in a corner. It not only takes up that unused space but fits beautifully. Modern elegance is how I would describe it. I would recommend a large room for this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Kehr

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Broken parts that don't allow it to be put together.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Adesso Trinity Arc Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamp! Easy to assemble. It has a very heavy base, which keeps the lamp very stable. Switch is in an awkward place, and comes off easily. For the price, I think they could have made the switch better quality. Like others, I was displeased with the styrofoam packing. You can't help but get a million little pieces of it breaking off when removing the lamp components. Overall, I love the lamp. It makes a statement, and I get a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bragg

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp if individual lights turned on properly
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lamp, BUT I can turn on the shortest light by itself but the other two turn on at the same time on switch two and three, turn four turns on all lights. I'm not handy so not sure how to fix this. Have not decided if I want to bother getting a replacement such a hassle. If these light worked properly I would give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rachell Youngman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - love it
customer_reviews.text: After reading pervious reviews, I was nervous. However... AMAZING!!! The base is extremely heavy and plenty heavy enough to support the arms. The shades seem to be good quality, they are made of burlap. The lamp is bronze. All hardware needed is included. The only downfall is that it does NOT come with assembly instructions, but it was pretty self-explanatory. Overall, we love love love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Allison and Jason

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control -
customer_reviews.text: A nice lamp with a pretty shade. But (the one we received) had a huge flaw in the marble base, and the plastic casing to hold the shade was broken. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: sophiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this lamp, but it was missing hex screw pieces and an allen wrench. The curved tube didn’t fit properly into the metal tube. My husband and I didn’t know if we should use a hammer to force it in. The metal stand also looks crooked. The only thing this has going for it is the marble base. After all the time it took to assemble, we just decided to keep it, but we are disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Myra

customer_reviews.title: We really like this lamp but it did arrive with the base ...
customer_reviews.text: We really like this lamp but it did arrive with the base chipped in several places and with dented lampshades. For almost $200 I'd expect better quality than that. It looks great in our living (due to the placement of it you can't see the chipped base) but when the light is on you can see where the dents were in the lampshades looking like big ugly brown spots, going to try and get replacement shades from amazon. If I get replacement shades will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Megan R.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. It's heavy, the shades are gorgeous. Easy to assemble. We put different wattage bulbs in with only one really bright bulb. We love it in our new 🏠
customer_reviews.author: HarperLeesMockingbird

product_meta.title: Adesso 4238-26 Trinity Arc Floor Lamp Antique Bronze FinisH, Beige Burlap Lamp. Home Decor Lamps and Light Fixtures, 82",3 Arm
product_meta.description: Color:Antique Bronze| Size:3-Arm| Style:TrinityThe contemporary Trinity Arc Lamp presents warm, rustic alternative to the typical arc lamp. A trio of beige burlap shades are suspended from arms with an antique bronze finish and controlled with a four-way rotary switch on the main pole. Three 100W incandescent bulbs or equivalent CFL's provide enough light to brighten an entire room. This lamp has a clear cord and is smart outlet compatible. Bulbs are not included. All Adesso lighting products are either UL listed or ETL listed, meaning it has been tested and approved to meet the government-regulated safety standards for the USA. When shopping for lighting products, we recommend to always look for the UL or ETL marks to ensure you are purchasing lighting that has been tested for safety standards by a 3rd party testing lab. Unfortunately, not all lighting products in the marketplace have been through 3rd party safety testing.
feature_bullets: 3-Light Floor Lamp: Ideal for living room or sectional. A rustic substitue to typical lamp fixtures and offers multi-directional light
Innovative Lighting Solution: Controlled with a four-way rotary switch on the main pole which operates as: right only/left and center only/all on/all off
Compatibility: Compatible with CFL bulbs & smart outlet
Easy to Use Floor Lamp: User-friendly, lightweight and convenient to fix. Has a clear cord
Each shade takes one 100-Watt incandescent or 13-Watt CFL bulb to provide enough light (bulbs not included in the package)

Material Construction: Three beige lamp shades connected to antique bronze finish pole are set in burlap fabric. The sleek pole stands on bronze circular base. Material breakdown— electric: 15.9 %, shade: 30.5 %, metal: 53.6 %
Lamp Dimensions: 82" H x 44" W x 43" D. Shade Dimensions (all): 7-5/8" H x 11", 11.5", & 12" diam. Base Dimension: 12.5 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,233 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
